sentences.en: Advanced education, high intelligence ( especially verbal intelligence ), open - mindedness, and good mental health abet empathic accuracy.
sentences.cn: 高等教育, 高级智能 ( 尤其是语言智能 ), 思想开放, 好的精神健康会帮助移情准确率.

sentences.en: Allegedly, backside abet is enigmatic general Beijing president.
sentences.cn: 据说, 背后主使乃是高深莫测的普京总统.

sentences.en: Be do grateful to those who rebuke you, because they abet your wisdom!
sentences.cn: 一定要感激那些斥责你的人, 因为他们助长了你的智慧!

sentences.en: Do not abet your friend to pry into other people's privacy.
sentences.cn: 不要唆使朋友去窥探别人隐私.

sentences.en: He can't help you anything, just abet you doing something that is lawless.
sentences.cn: 他帮不了你什么, 只会怂恿你干些非法的事情.

sentences.en: His wife was sentenced to seven years imprisonment for aiding and abetting him.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子因与他同谋被判决关押七年。

sentences.en: It's illegal to aid and abet a thief.
sentences.cn: 伙同小偷作案是有罪的.

trans.tran_cn: 教唆, 煽动, 帮助, 支持
trans.tran_en: to help someone do something wrong or illegal

trans.tran_cn: 教唆（犯罪），煽动，怂恿，支持
